queries.query: undead creature that mocks its enemies and has demoralizing laughter
queries.variant: creature that is undead and mocks foes with unsettling laughter

queries.variant: skeleton that cackles and debuffs enemies nearby

queries.variant: medium undead that inflicts psychic damage and gives disadvantage

queries.variant: skeleton with low AC that is weak to turning effects and has vision in the dark

queries.variant: skeleton that uses cackling and mocking against living targets
